assessmentQuestionVersion.name: HREESI_PrivacyText2
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: The personal information is collected under the respective authority of section 4(2)(a) of the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council Act, section 4(2)(a) of the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council Act, or sections 4, 5 and 26 of the Canadian Institutes of Health Research Act, depending on the program.
